tools.name: Google
tools.description: Worker that searches results from Google. Useful when you need to find short answers about a specific topic.

tools.name: LLM
tools.description: A pretrained LLM like yourself. Useful when you need to act with general language model.

tools.name: CurrentWeather
tools.description: 获取某个城市的当前天气信息

tools.name: DailyWeatherForecast
tools.description: 获取某个城市未来几天的天气预报

tools.name: HourlyWeatherForecast
tools.description: 获取某个城市逐小时的天气预报

tools.name: MinuteByMinutePrecipitation
tools.description: 提供某个地区每分钟的降水信息

tools.name: WeatherDisasterWarning
tools.description: 提供天气相关的灾害预警信息

tools.name: WeatherWarningCityList
tools.description: 列出所有当前有天气预警的城市

tools.name: WeatherIndexForecast1D
tools.description: 提供某个城市未来一天的天气指数预报

tools.name: WeatherIndexForecast3D
tools.description: 提供某个城市未来三天的天气指数预报

tools.name: CurrentAirQualityIndex
tools.description: 获取某个城市的当前空气质量指数

tools.name: DailyAirQualityForecast
tools.description: 获取某个城市未来几天的空气质量预报

tools.name: WeatherHistory
tools.description: 查询某个城市的历史天气数据

tools.name: HourlySolarRadiationForecast24H
tools.description: 提供未来24小时的逐小时太阳辐射预报

tools.name: HourlySolarRadiationForecast72H
tools.description: 提供未来72小时的逐小时太阳辐射预报

tools.name: CityLookup
tools.description: 通过城市名称或其他信息搜索城市

tools.name: TopCityLookup
tools.description: 获取当前最热门的城市列表

tools.name: POISearch
tools.description: 搜索某个城市或地区的旅游景点

tools.name: POIAreaSearch
tools.description: 在指定范围内搜索旅行景点

tools.name: SunriseSunset
tools.description: 获取某个城市的日出和日落时间

tools.name: GetExchangeRates
tools.description: 获取不同货币之间的汇率信息

tools.name: LocationtoLatLon
tools.description: 通过地点名称搜索其经纬度信息

tools.name: SearchHotels
tools.description: 搜索符合条件的酒店列表

tools.name: SearchHotelDestination
tools.description: 搜索某个目的地的酒店

tools.name: GetHotelDetails
tools.description: 获取指定酒店的详细信息

tools.name: GetHotelRoomAvailability
tools.description: 获取酒店的房间空房情况

tools.name: GetHotelDescriptionAndInfo
tools.description: 获取酒店的描述信息和其他详细资料

tools.name: GetHotelReviewScores
tools.description: 获取酒店的评分和用户评论

tools.name: SearchFlights
tools.description: 搜索符合条件的航班信息

tools.name: SearchFlightLocation
tools.description: 搜索航班的目的地和出发地相关信息

tools.name: GetMinFlightPrice
tools.description: 搜索某个时间段内最低价的航班信息

tools.name: SearchAttractionLocation
tools.description: 搜索某个地点的旅行景点

tools.name: SearchAttractions
tools.description: 搜索某个城市或地区的所有旅行景点

tools.name: GetAttractionDetails
tools.description: 获取某个旅行景点的详细信息
